mapper.select: SELECT cp.id, cp.card_type AS cardType, cp.organization_code AS bankId, -- 여기만 교체 (alias는 프론트/VO와 맞춰 bankId로 유지) cp.card_product_name AS cardProductName, cp.card_image_url AS cardImageUrl, cp.annual_fee AS annualFee, cp.issued_date AS issuedDate, cp.required_monthly_spent AS requiredMonthlySpending, COUNT(sb.id) AS benefitCount FROM card_product cp LEFT JOIN store_benefit sb ON cp.id = sb.card_product_id GROUP BY cp.id, cp.card_type, cp.organization_code, cp.card_product_name, cp.card_image_url, cp.annual_fee, cp.issued_date, cp.required_monthly_spent ORDER BY benefitCount DESC, cp.issued_date DESC
SELECT id, card_product_name, card_image_url FROM card_product

SELECT cp.id, cp.card_type AS cardType, cp.organization_code AS bankId, o.organization_name AS organizationName, cp.card_product_name AS cardProductName, cp.card_image_url AS cardImageUrl, cp.apply_url AS applyUrl, cp.annual_fee AS annualFee, cp.issued_date AS issuedDate, cp.required_monthly_spent AS requiredMonthlySpent, COUNT(sb.id) AS benefitCount FROM card_product cp LEFT JOIN store_benefit sb ON cp.id = sb.card_product_id LEFT JOIN organization o ON o.organization_code = cp.organization_code WHERE cp.id = #{productId} GROUP BY cp.id, cp.card_type, cp.organization_code, o.organization_name, cp.card_product_name, cp.card_image_url, cp.apply_url, cp.annual_fee, cp.issued_date, cp.required_monthly_spent

SELECT cp.id AS cp_id, cp.card_product_name, cp.card_image_url, cp.apply_url, cp.required_monthly_spent, cp.annual_fee, sb.store_category, sb.store_name, sb.description AS description FROM card_product cp LEFT JOIN store_benefit sb ON cp.id = sb.card_product_id WHERE cp.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM card_product cp WHERE cp.card_product_name = #{name}
